titleStmt.title: Wiley v. Keokuk. Petition in Error Continue

bibl.title: Wiley v. Keokuk. Petition in Error Continue
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: 3d That the said court errd in refusing to give the instructions which the said Albert Wiley prayed the Court to give the jury.
4h That the verdict & judgement of said court of the jury is not sustaind by the evidence and is contrary to law.
5th That the demifys grin of the jury and the judgement ajoint in Albert Wiley and cassive.
6th That the judgement was given for the said Keokuk when it ought to have been given for the said Albert Wiley according to law

7th That the Court erred in overrauling the said Albert Wileys Nothing Her a new trial. That That said plaintiff therefore prays that the said judgement may be reversed, and the said plaintiff to all things he has last by reason therefor.
Riffs Neviron & Trade Attemp for Plaintiff
In the Supreme Court of State of Kansas Court
I do hereby Waive the and service of in the above entitled
